mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM users WHERE user_email = #{userEmail} AND user_pw = #{userPw}
SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, user_pk, music_title, music_desc, like_count, privacy, created_dt FROM music WHERE music_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND privacy = 'Y'
